description: "Tokyo Fashion", is the official Android app of TokyoFashion.com - the most popular English-language Japanese street fashion website in the world. 550,000+ Facebook fans and 70,000+ Twitter followers can't be wrong! The free "Tokyo Fashion" app - for phones and tablets - features daily updated street snaps from Harajuku, Shibuya, and other areas of Tokyo, Japanese fashion news, fashion brand profiles, Tokyo shop info, real-time updates from various social networks (Facebook, Twitter, etc) and much more. You can also set Tokyo street snaps as wallpaper on your phone/tablet. The free custom wallpapers can be set via simple mode or with more advanced options! Besides the daily news and street fashion pictures, the Tokyo Fashion Android app also provides you with photos and reports from special fashion events around Tokyo - including the Japan Fashion Week in Tokyo, Harajuku Kawaii (featuring Kyary Pamyu Pamyu) and Tokyo Girls Collection fashion shows. The Tokyo Fashion app is meant to keep you up-to-date while inspiring you and giving you ideas for your daily style. If you have any interest in fashion - or in the amazing megalopolis that is Tokyo - this free app is a must-have! You can share your comments on Japanese fashion with other users right inside of the app. In case you're wondering what you might find inside, the Tokyo Fashion app includes many different types of fashion and subcultures like Dolly Kei, Fairy Kei, Visual Kei, Gothic Lolita, Sweet Lolita, Decora, Cosplay, and Gyaru. Popular brands and shops that we often post pictures from include Shibuya 109, LaForet, 6%DOKIDOKI, Angelic Pretty, Baby The Stars Shine Bright, Dog, BAPE, Undercover, Comme des Garcons, Spank, Galaxxxy, Grimoire, Vivienne Westwood, Spinns, Uniqlo, Hysteric Glamour, Jeremy Scott, Liz Lisa, Takeshita Dori stores, and many more. This is just a small taste of what you might see on any given day! Future versions of this app - already in development - will feature even higher resolution pictures as several other improvements to the street snap section. Future versions will include shopping maps of Tokyo, even more detailed brand information, and other features still in development. Please visit the support site (or our Facebook page) to suggest improvements and new features that you'd like to see. We want to make this app everything you've ever dreamed of - and more!
release_text: Another update! - Improved images on many tablets - more crisp and pretty! - Twitter and Facebook code updates. - Bug fixes and improved code. - You can now set any street snap as a wallpaper on your phone or tablet! - Street snaps now load faster and don't require any clicks - just scroll and more snaps appear! - Please send us your feedback and suggestions - we need your help!

description: La aplicación Torno te permite controlar el tiempo que has estado trabajando fácilmente. Además te permite exportar los datos en varios formatos para poder procesarlos posteriormente. Incluye un widget para que fichar te resulte más fácil. The application lets you control lathe time you've been working easily. It also lets you export data in various formats for further processing. Includes a widget for you to sign easier.
release_text: Se han añadido dos nuevas opciones. Una para poder configurar el horario con horas de entrada mínima y hora de salida máxima. También se puede seleccionar un intervalo de horas que no serán computables en caso de tener que descontar tiempo por comida, desayuno, etc...

description: TransitWidget allows you to view real-time predictions for bus stops in a widget on your home or lock screen from the MBTA, MTA, SF Muni and many other transit agencies (anything supported by NextBus!) - Widgets are configured to update during a specific time of day or when tapped, so they won't drain your battery when you don't need them. - Updating notifications are provided, so you can get the time to the next bus from the notification panel. - For an even better experience, use WidgetLocker to put your transit widgets on the lock screen and you'll have access to them just by pressing the power button. Upcoming Features: - More configurable widgets (disable notifications, etc...) Feedback: Have a suggestion or comment about the app? Please let me know at support@john.sh
release_text: v1.1 - 11/17/2012 Fixed a bug preventing real-time predictions from loading for some routes.

description: Enjoy the benefits of an indoor cycling class in the convenient form of an Android application, with Indoor Cycling Coach. Build stamina, strength, speed and endurance, using routines designed to maximise the productivity of your workout. Choose the routine type, choose the duration, choose a playlist of tunes...and then you're good to go. Indoor Cycling Coach will display the RPM at which you should be pedalling and the amount of resistance you should be using. Adjust the resistance level of your bike to the indicated degree of difficulty, and match your pedal speed with that of the on-screen wheel. Like a real indoor cycling class the instructions will change at set periods, to simulate the efforts required for, say, a gruelling up-hill climb, a thigh-burning sprint, or a simple, gentle warm-up. The routines contained within Indoor Cycling Coach are dynamically generated, dependent on the type and duration of the routine you select. These routines were designed by Simon Reynolds, who, through the benefits of indoor cycling combined with a carefully controlled diet guided by the LighterLife* programme, shed 16 stone in 6 months. By practically halving his initial 33 stone body weight, Simon has become an ambassador for the world of indoor cycling, and Indoor Cycling Coach is his way of spreading the benefits to others. * For more information on LighterLife, please visit www.lighterlife.com. NB. Certain devices (for example, the Samsung Galaxy S2 pre ICS) have a default media player app which does not create music playlists correctly. This is a known flaw in these devices, which will mean that these playlists will not be available within Indoor Cycling Coach. The accepted workaround is to download an alternative media player application (we recommend Winamp Free) and use that to create your playlists instead. For more information please read: http://flemmingbob.blogspot.com/2012/04/my-samsung-galaxy-s2-wont-find-my.html
release_text: Latest android release permission fix for nexus series mobile phones. Improvements for image caching.

description: Download our new and improved ULTA app to take your love for beauty and everything fabulous on the go with our effortless new mobile experience! View our special offers and savings and easily access your ULTAmate Rewards information. It's easier than ever to see what's new and shop for everything beauty conveniently from your phone! • Shop quickly – fast, seamless checkout means super-speedy shopping anytime, anywhere • Access your ULTAmate Rewards account for full account details including easy access to your points balance and rewards number • Access your ULTA.com account to see your past purchases and favorite products • Buy products and gift cards, read reviews, discover exclusive offers and more • Search for information by category, brand, price, top-selling, and new arrivals • Scan your favorite product to gather info, ratings and reviews and product Q&A while shopping in our stores • Use your GPS or enter a ZIP code to find nearby stores • Share your favorite products and fabulous looks, even upload your own photos! • Access our weekly ad and mailers for latest sales, exclusive offers, and fabulous new products
release_text: Bug fixes and performance improvement.

description: ---This is a version for beta-testers, please don't rate it low. This game is under heavy development so several updates a day will be expected--- A new era of Music Quiz Games as just begun!!! Remember the old times when Music Quiz Games were based on questions or on your SD-Card Music? Those times are over!!!! In Ultimate Music Quiz you can play with musics from a Last.fm Username, a Artist/Band or from a Last.fm Tag. For example, if you choose tho play with the tag Rock or Pop the songs that you have to guess are that ones that were tagged in Last.fm as Rock or Pop. Are you a 60s or 80s music lover? Just choose 60s or 80s as the tag. Here you can see the Top Tags in Last.fm ( http://www.last.fm/charts/toptags ) Known Issues: - In time when passing from 01 to 00 it takes 2 seconds - It's only optimized for HVGA (320x480) - Sometimes appears songs that are not related with the tag, or artist - If the name as a & sometimes don't appear the text after the & - Some state buttons images are missing - In artist game mode sometimes it gets stuck, you have to go back several times to give force close or kill the app - Some songs appear repeatedly in one game - The Options button does not work --ATTENTION - Each game of UMQ generates about 20MB of data, so it recommended that you use a Wi-fi connection-- The High Scores are powered by ScoreLoop and this Game is Ad Supported. In final version High Scores will be reseted. I want to make Ultimate Music Quiz the best Music Quiz for Android, and for that I'll need your help. All feedback are welcome and will be taken in consideration even in Android Market Comments. And remember, don't rate it low and take in consideration that this is my firt game for Android and it is in a early beta stage.

description: urecy(ウレシイ)はカップル、友だち、家族などプライベート向けのグループ共有アプリです。 グループ内ではカレンダーでスケジュール共有、メモや写真の共有、ツイートができます。 ************************* こんな人におすすめ ************************* 家族でスケジュール共有をしたい 夫婦で家事、育児の予定を分担したい 夫婦で子供の予定を共有したい カップル同士でスケジュールや記念日を共有をしたい 職場でお客さまの予約状況を共有したい 友だちと部活やサークルなどのスケジュールを共有したい 限られた人だけでコミュニケーションのとれるスペースが欲しい ************************* 特徴 ************************* ■コルクボードでメモや写真を共有 コルクボードにはメモ、写真を貼り付けてグループのメンバーで共有ができます。 コルクボードに貼付けることでタイムラインのようにあっという間に流れてしまう事がありません。 スケジュール調整や連絡の告知など使い方は自由です。 ■カレンダーで予定を共有 カレンダーを使えばグループのメンバーと簡単に予定を共有できます。 友達の予定を確認済みにマークするとき、自分のiPhoneのカレンダーにも保存することもできるので、 ネットにつながらない場合に確認できて便利です。 ■手書きツイートで感情豊かなコミュニケーション 手書き機能でカラフルで感情豊かなツイートができるようになりました。 テキストだけでは物足りない！そんなときは手書きツイートを作ってみましょう。 おなじみの顔文字もカラフルに自由にレイアウトできるので、より感情豊かなコミュニケーションができます。 ■10人まで urecy(ウレシイ)は友だち、カップル、家族、夫婦などプライベートな関係向けに作られています。 そのため、グループは最大10人の人数制限があります。 ココだけの話は気の許せる人たちと楽しみましょう。 ■フェードアウト機能 何かしらの理由で疎遠になってしまったグループからは自然にフェードアウトします。 グループ内でのツイート、コルクボードへの貼付けなどの活動(アクティビティ)が一定期間無い場合、フェードアウトの対象となります。 進学、引っ越し、転職など人生の転機に出会いと別れはつきものです。 urecyはユーザーのリアルな人間関係に自然にフィットするようになっています。 ************************* 機能 ************************* グループ毎に以下のことができます。 ・手書きツイート NEW! ・添付画像を手書き編集 NEW! ・ツイート ・ツイートに写真を添付 ・ツイートに位置情報を付ける ・カレンダーでスケジュールの共有 ・スケジュールを端末のカレンダーに登録 ・コルクボードでテキストメモの共有 ・コルクボードで写真の共有 ・お知らせ グループ内で発生した各種イベントがお知らせとして通知されます。 urecy (nice) is a group of private sharing app for couples, friends, and family. description: Teacher Review "As a teacher, I find many obstacles in finding the perfect medium in which to share information with my students. This often includes hours of searches, you tube searches, etc. This app is amazing! It takes those hours I used to spend and turns them into seconds with one touch of this app. I love it! Thanks again for creating such an awesome app that gives me hours of my life back! " In the information age of today education, learning and teaching is changing fast. The technology that is being used in and outside of the classroom is everywhere. Almost every student has a cell phone with access to the Internet. Even with out Internet access there are educational applications for iPhone, iPad,. The methods for teaching students and special needs students are expanding. Some schools are going all iPad. Meaning all students will have iPads with digital textbooks and new learning tools. For students these types of applications can be very useful. The student who cannot focus on one type of learning at a time can flip back and fourth through the app to stay focused. The student who is an extremely visual learner will be attracted to the devices colorful screen of pictures in the lesson. The student who has trouble writing notes or preparing them self for a test can simply open up previous lessons and practice on the interactive quizzes of the apps. The student who is a auditory learner can listen to nature sounds while reviewing topics or watch videos related to each topic. The very high performing student can find interesting topic related daily news and summarize it for the class. All of these options can be utilized through one educational app. U.S. History Regents Buddy is the ultimate tool for learning history. This app was designed by a teacher who has used all possible multimedia resources in the classroom for teaching regents curriculum. U.S. History Regents Buddy is not only an app for learning U.S. History but also a app for teachers. The features of this app makes studying extremely convenient. This app is the ultimate learning tool for all students taking U.S. History. This app covers all topics in NYS regents US history and AP US history. This app gives the opportunity to study and become very knowledgeable about US history. This app includes Topics covered on this app are: 1. US Geography 2. 1792-1800 Election Results 3. French and Indian War 4. Road to Revolution 5. American Revolution 6. War Of 1812 7. Era Of Good Feeling 8. Early 19c America 9. Andrew Jackson 10. Chesapeake Colonization 11. Election Of 1840 12. Restoration Colonies 13. New England Colonization 14. Antebellum American Art 15. Antebellum Reformers 16. Antebellum South 17. IndustrializationIn America 18. Election Of 1844 19. 1850s Road To Secession 20. Manifest Destiny 21. Civil War 22. Atrocities Of The Civil War 23. Late 19c Urbanization 24. Reconstruction 25. Gilded Age Politics 26. Populism and the Election of 1896 27. Rise Of Big Business 28. Growth Of The Labor Movement 29. America an Imperial Power 30. Life In Gilded Age NYC 31. American Foreign Policy 1920-1941 32. Beginning of Cold War 33. Eisenhower-Foreign Policy 34. Election Of 1912 35. Closing The Western Frontier 36. 1950s American Culture 37. description: Celestial Navigator is a must have app for mariners and any other person interested in celestial navigation. It features a rise set and merpass calculator, a line of position and compass error including gyro calculator , a celestial fix calculator (with auto run up and dead reckoning),an almanac of sun,moon,planets and 58 navigational stars.It supports the three most widely used navigational methods for calculation of lines of position i.e. intercept,long by chronometer and latitude by meridian altitude. It also features a true wind calculator (giving wind speed and direction,dew point and relative humidity),an eta calculator (multiple results are shown at a time depending upon the user settings),a sailing calculator featuring great circle and Mercator sailing calculators along with intermediate point calculator. It also displays the device's position(lat,long,speed,cog) from the GPS and the compass heading. The accuracy of the results displayed has been thoroughly tested with the US navy website, the nautical almanac of 2013.The results are with in 10-15 seconds which is accurate enough for sea. Please read the help carefully. The app contains can export the almanac data and celestial observations data to the external SD card.

description: Godinterest (the Christian version of Pinterest) allows Christians to collect and share photos of their favourite events, interests and hobbies. Godinterest acts as a bespoke Christian media platform, whereby users' content and the content of others can be browsed on the main page of the Godinterest beta app. _____________________________________ CHRISTIAN SOCIAL NETWORKING PLATFORM Inspired by the Need for Wholesome Content Sharing, Godinterest Offers a Pinterest alternative for those who want to share within a Christian environment. In the same way that Pinterest works Godinterest is a photo-driven platform. MISSION: Godinterest's mission is to connect Christians through the interests they share. Users can upload images and embed videos to boards, which can be used to organise images they love from around the web or from their very own work. BETA APP: Godinterest Beta App is a fun way to capture and share God's world in moments with family and friends. FEATURES: • Access to mobile version of site • Enables login or registration with Facebook, Twitter or LinkedIn profiles • Allows you to take and upload photos directly from your mobile device or add YouTube video links. • Browse daily "Hot", "New" and "Top" rated photos • Comment on "photos" • Free registration includes access to all of the website's features. As this is a beta app, to access the full features of Godinterest login via a desktop computer at http://godinterest.com . _____________________________________ For those who want to maintain their Christian values while still interacting with those on the Internet, Godinterest could be a great option. With comparable features to Pinterest offered in a platform that is marketed as being safe for the entire family, the environment offered on Godinterest could be just what the Christian community is searching for. Capture and Share God's World in Moments _____________________________________ Website: http://Godinterest.com . Facebook page: http://facebook.com/godinterestUK Twitter page: http://twitter.com/godinterestUK Help Centre: godinterest.uservoice.com _____________________________________ Terms of use and Privacy Policy: http://godinterest.com/terms-of-use

description: About GooseTheArtist.com's app: I got my start when I was 5 drawing Spider-Man which quickly escalated in me making comics of my own. Not long after that I began practicing portraiture at a young age using the realistic techniques from that in more conceptual, dark and politically themed works. I have studied at Butler High School, Art Academy of Cincinnati and The Kentucky Center Governor’s School for the Arts. I am currently in my senior year of high school. Big things to come. Mark James on John Faughender - ” As a gallery owner, I have young people approach me regularly, wanting me to recognize their talent as the next great artist. I patiently explore their work, and offer what critique i can to help them grow. The critique is more often than not received as a rejection. I was introduced to John Faughender by a mutual friend who raved about him enough that I had my expectations set on more of the same. John arrived with a prepared portfolio, and the ability to discuss his art both conceptually and technically. As we explored his presentation, I came to see that John really had the potential to achieve greatness. My gallery focuses on finding artists that want to produce shows making relevant social commentary more so than technically adept pretty pictures or accessory art. John’s portfolio did not fit this profile, but his desire to learn and excel drove him to explore this idea, and after 2 rejected proposals, presented me with a concept, prepared sketches, and a willingness to take direction that resulted in his being given a solo show in April 2014. John is the artist that creates daily, explores the construct of his birth as an imperfect creation, and seeks to expose himself to the World through his creations. I have no doubt he will be the rare artist that matures early and becomes capable of showing the World to itself.

description: Любишь новые знакомства или ищешь новых друзей? А может ты хочешь найти страничку красотки или красавца из соседнего дома? Мы поможем тебе! Приложение "Мы рядом" делает поиск фото Вконтакте рядом с тобой простым и удобным. Ежедневно многие пользователи социальных сетей загружают фотографии на свои страницы и если EXIF данные этих фото содержат координаты (данные о местоположении), она отобразится на карте! Многие мобильные устройства при съемке фотографии вносят в нее данные о гео-позиции. Ты сможешь увидеть место где эта фотография была сделана, и ссылку на страницу того кто её выложил на свою страницу. ***Обращаем ваше внимание, что все отображаемые фотографии берутся только из открытых, общедоступных альбомов. В приложении присутствует удобный поиск. Можно отфильтровать результаты по полу, возрасту, дате публикации и т.д. Есть возможность исключить из поиска страницы в статусе которых указано "Замужем/Женат", "Помолвлен(а)", а так же пользователей у которых личные сообщения открыты только для друзей. Мы планируем и дальше расширять функционал приложения, чтобы вы возвращались к нему снова и снова, а для этого нам очень нужны ваши отзывы. Загружайте, делитесь впечатлениями, ставьте оценки, и не забывайте: Мы рядом! Do you like to meet new people, or are looking for new friends? Or maybe you want to find a page or handsome beauty of the house next door? We'll help you! Appendix "We are close," makes searching photos FaceBook near you simple and convenient. Every day, many social network users upload photos to your pages and if EXIF ​​data of the photo contains the coordinates (location information), it will be displayed on the map! Many mobile devices when taking a picture make it data on geo-position. You'll be able to see the place where the photo was taken, and a link to a page that someone posted it on your page. *** Please note that all images displayed are taken only from open, public albums. In the appendix there is an easy search. You can filter the results by gender, age, date of publication, etc. It is possible to exclude from the search page in the status that shows "Married / Married," "Engaged (s)", as well as users who have private messages visible only to friends. We plan to further expand the functionality of the application, so that you come back to it again and again, and for that we really need your feedback. Upload, share experiences, put the estimates and do not forget: We are close!

description: "Pregnancy Week Reminder" is a widget app, which shows you the current pregnancy week in home screen. You can get your date easily by glancing your phone. Besides, there is a due date calculator in setting activity. The data is refresh every 1 hour. No background service running to save your battery power. ========================================================= Version 1.1 change log Fix issue(s): 1. Italic style Updated: 1. Change min reminder text size from 5 to 10 2. Change reminder text edit to single line mode Enhancement: 1. Add code to handle date exception, which out of normal range ( 0 day ~ 340 days)

description: WhatsApp Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages. WHY USE WHATSAPP: • NO FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family, so you don't have to pay for every message or call.* There are no subscription fees to use WhatsApp. • MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages. • FREE CALLS: Call your friends and family for free with WhatsApp Calling, even if they're in another country.* WhatsApp calls use your phone's Internet connection rather than your cellular plan's voice minutes. (Note: Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. Also, you can't access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp). • GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family. • WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer's browser. • NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There's no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.* • SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone's existing address book. • ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you're always logged in so you don't miss messages. No more confusion about whether you're logged in or logged out. • QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there's no need to add hard-to-remember usernames. • OFFLINE MESSAGES: Even if you miss your notifications or turn off your phone, WhatsApp will save your recent messages until the next time you use the app. • AND MUCH MORE: Share your location, exchange contacts, set custom wallpapers and notification sounds, email chat history, broadcast messages to multiple contacts at once, and more! *Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. --------------------------------------------------------- We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at: android-support@whatsapp.com or follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/WhatsApp @WhatsApp ---------------------------------------------------------

description: Math Square is a puzzle that requires formation of mathematical equations, the aim is to work out where each number goes to solve the equations. Word Search displays a matrix of characters, where you have to find the hidden words given at bottom of the matrix. Select the word by touching the starting character and drag your finger to complete the word. If the word selected is correct, it will highlight that word. There is also a crossword game. The clues are on the bottom of the screen.

description: Where have you been? This application provides brief information for 292 countries, territories and islands (all the countries of the world). This includes capital, population, area, language, currency, time zone, dialing code and electricity details. It also includes over 550 sites that you may visit (13 categories - buildings, deserts, oceans, wonders of the world, US states, etc). Tick the places you have visited, and review the statistics. Please contact me if you wish to have sites added!
release_text: Added Zanzibar and Elliot Island.

description: ** Selected by Google as Editors’ Choice and downloaded more than 10 million times worldwide. ** Elevate is a brain training program designed to improve attention, speaking skills, processing speed, memory, math skills, and more. Each person is provided with his or her own personalized training program that adjusts over time to maximize results. The more you train with Elevate, the more you’ll improve critical cognitive skills that are designed to boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. Users who train at least 3 times per week have reported dramatic gains and increased confidence. FEATURES * 35+ brain games for critical cognitive skills like focus, memory, processing, math, precision, and comprehension * Detailed performance tracking * Personalized daily workouts that include the skills you need most * Adaptive difficulty progression to ensure your experience is challenging * Workout calendar to help you track your streaks and stay motivated * And more! IN THE NEWS CNET “Elevate comes out ahead” in the battle of the brain training apps. Wall Street Journal Compared with other brain games, “I prefer Elevate the most.” Washington Post Elevate is a “cognitive pick-me-up” with games that are “good for mental breaks throughout the workday.” RESEARCH BEHIND ELEVATE Elevate's brain games are designed in collaboration with experts in education and are based on proven educational techniques. Elevate’s brain training algorithms draw from cognitive research in attention and memory studies to develop a personalized training program for each user.
release_text: • Introducing Equivalence, a new Math game that helps you master the most commonly used fractions • Downloading process improved to reduce data usage • New educational content added to Detail, Expression, Extraction, Processing, and Sequencing

description: Israel History Maps: Geographical Chronology of Jewish Sovereignty and Presence in the Middle East More information about the project can be found at http://www.IsraelHistoryMaps.com The project is available for purchase via: Printed book (softcover) can be found here: https://www.createspace.com/5527043 Printed book (hardcover) can be found here: http://www.lulu.com/shop/ilan-reiner-and-amir-reiner/israel-history-maps/hardcover/product-22227947.html The " Israel History Maps " was created to illustrate the Jewish presence and heritage in the Middle East region throughout the last 3400+ years, and to refute the claim that Jews have only recently arrived and brutally taken their land from other sovereigns in recent centuries. The project contains over 50 informative legible maps of today's Israel's region illustrating sovereignty in easy to understand, friendly graphics, along with a periodical timeline. The map set is divided into three eras, marking the three main periods of Jewish sovereignty in the region. The project is based on extensive research by previous winner of "The Tanach Quiz", Ilan Reiner, who has in depth knowledge of Jewish geography and history. Printed book (softcover) can be found here: https://www.createspace.com/5527043 website: http://israelhistorymaps.com/ facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IsraelHistoryMaps Team: Created and Produced by Amir Reiner Research and Graphics by Ilan Reiner Software Design by ConKor Systems Ltd ( http://www.conkor.co.il ) If you liked it, I think you would also find the following app interesting: IJewish Timeline - 6000 Years Ronen Rabinovici https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.odyeda.JewishTimeline_Hebrew
release_text: null

description: Take a breathtaking 3D ride on your way to meet with an extraterrestrial, then soar at light speed through majestic spiral galaxies and nebulas. With incredible 3D effects that will have you submerged in the mysteries of the cosmos, this app is designed with hypnotic visual effects, ideal for meditation. It is possible to meditate and free the mind from all thoughts by concentrating on any of the visuals. This visual stimulation tool contains 12 space related 3D visuals. These are also available as live wallpapers, which can be downloaded for FREE from this app. With the touch of a button, you’ll be transported into deep space. Change the speed of your voyage through space simply by touching the upper and lower parts of the screen. Visualizations of morphing galaxies with ever changing star formations are included. These animations are inspired by formulas and patterns from galaxy formations. View the galaxies as they shift, morph, collapse and expand. A visualization of a gamma ray burst is also included. These are the brightest and most powerful events in the universe, emitting flashes of rays from extremely energetic explosions in distant galaxies. From the convenience of your mobile phone or tablet, you’ll be drawn in by the mesmerizing visuals as you are taken on a fantastical journey through space and time from wherever you are: work, home or even travelling. The full version is a music visualizer, which syncs the visuals with your favorite music. The full version has no commercials. xedgarwertXpjk
release_text: null

description: Five Hundred (500) is a fun and addictive 4 player card game with 2 teams of 2 players (3 CPU players). Teams bid how many tricks they think they will win and get rewarded points if they make their bid. The first team to reach 500 points wins. Features: - Extensive how to play guide. - All bid types available (including Closed Misere and Open Misere). - Advanced CPU players. - Ability to change individual CPU player difficulties. - Different table styles. If you have any suggestions, issues or other feedback, please email me at crazzledazzledev@gmail.com and if necessary I will try to get an update out asap. Enjoy playing Five Hundred! NOTE: If you are having problems with winning the bid you need to go to your phone's Settings->Developer Options and turn "Don't keep activities" to OFF. Five Hundred uses multiple activities so having this ON will cause problems. These settings should only be altered by developers for the purpose of testing apps. if your aim is to not keep apps in memory then get an app killer because your messing with the wrong thing! Keywords: Five Hundred 500 bridge card cards game spades hearts clubs diamonds euchre bidding bid trumps trick tricks
release_text: Increased card size for 7 inch tablet users.

description: -- For users of the free version -- » To transfer the history data from the free app to the payment one, you have to finish setting up the payment app before uninstalling the free one. Otherwise data will be lost. Please, before giving us a bad score for an error, we prefer that you warn us. We will try to fix them as soon as possible. Do not pay more on your phone bill. Control Your Calls + will be your greatest ally if: » You have a plan with a number of free minutes. » You can send some free SMS. » You need to monitor your internet data consumption. » You are not sure if your mobile contract fits your actual consumption. Control Your Calls + is just what you need. Very easy to set up and use, it will become one of your essential applications in no time. -- How does it work? -- » Every time you make a call, the application will inform you of the remaining time you have left. » During a call, you will receive a vibrating alert when you have consumed 25%, 50%, 75%, 98% and 100% of the available time, this way you won't exceed the limit of your rate even if you're talking. » If you have exceeded the limit, to make a new call you will be ask to continue. » Sets vip numbers for calls and sms (sms and calls that are free). » You can control the number of SMS sent, and Internet data consumption, everything in a very visual way. » The app has widgets. » Control different types of rates:    · Minutes for all calls.    · Distinguishing minutes by fixed and mobile calls (currently only for Spain).    · Distinguishing minutes by calls on weekends, and on weekdays. » And all this is very easy to configure. -- Why should I buy the application, if there is a free one? -- » Think that the app is not an expense but an investment. Once the app will help you not to overcome the limit of your fee, you will have already saved more than it costs. » The app price is approximately the cost of a coffee in Spain (1,20€ is what we receive from the total amount). We think it is a reasonable price and it will help us to continue improving the app. » You pay for the app only once, all the updates are included, even if you change your mobile phone, if you use the same gmail account. » The payment app includes controlling Internet data consumption and desktop widgets. » Includes new fees, such as separating the minutes of calls made on a weekend, the weekday. » Improved interface. » All new future features will be included on the payment version. The free app will only receive bug fixes. -- Required permissions -- » Access to read contact details (for the call history). » Intercept outgoing calls (warnings). » Make phone calls (continue a call after the warning of limit reached). » Read sms for having statistics of the sent sms. -- Privacy -- » The data handled by such applications are quite sensitive (your phonebook contacts, calls, sms, etc). All data used by Control Your Calls + remain on your phone. You can verify this by checking that the application does not need permission to connect to the internet. » Always check the permissions used by applications, they tell you what the apps can do on your phone. Please write to android@creativemad.com for any suggestion or error that you want to comment us, included translation issues. Disclaimer: We are not responsible for any problems caused by improper operation of the application.
release_text: Version 2.18.0 » Added text widgets for available and consumed time. » Added an option to configure the action when tapping over a widget: open the app or update data.

description: You are a head of a company or a sales manager. You sell products or services trying to increase sales. Where do you keep your contacts? On sheets of paper? Do you put them in a day planner? In Excel? That's already all in the past. Let us introduce a fundamentally new product: Smarty CRM! This is a complete and intuitive tool to maintain the loyalty of your partners. With its help you can manage a database, set reminders, and record collaboration milestones. It even works offline. Opportunities — Personal and business contacts — Chats, communication with clients and partners — Goals (the system of setting goals) — Notes — Diary and organizer — NEW! File storage (available in the web version on smartycrm.com) — NEW! Import contacts from * .xls (available in the web version on smartycrm.com) Your work with each client (whether you like it or not) goes through a series of stages: establishing a new contact, identification of needs, presentation of a product, and so on. These are the basics of marketing — it is always this way, even if you have not thought about it. Smarty CRM allows you to see at what stage the client is, and suggests what activities are needed all in English. Smarty CRM has an understandable and easy-to-read interface, well-designed filters, and convenient searching. Your business can be seen at a glance. Set a reminder for a call or a meeting directly from the contact card with just a few taps. And your device will remind you about the event. Smarty CRM is a classic free cloud service enabling you to work online on Android as well as via a web browser. Synchronize data with the server and be sure that they will not be lost. If you encounter difficulties, contact us. We'll promptly help you deal with the problem or fix the errors. With Smarty CRM you will love your job as much as we do!
release_text: Bug fixes.

description: Travelling to Croatia? Having difficulties planning your trip searching for ferry schedules and route maps? Or, you might be missing having a timetable at hand for a quick reference while enjoying your trip? Then you might find this app useful. Here you will find the widest spread of ferry operators operating in the Adriatic sea. All the international routes to/from Croatia, including all the Croatian local ferry connections. More than 60 ferry routes with corresponding maps and timetables at your fingertips, along with branch offices/authorized agencies contact info of ticket sale/booking points. Port maps with ferry departure points, so you don't lose time finding your destinations address. Routes are searchable by regions of Croatian coast, defined by major coastal cities. If you're not familiar with Croatian places, an update is planned where you would be able to pick a route on a map. The app is 20 MB in size, due to the fact that all the graphics and other assets - maps and timetable PDF's, are stored in-app, offline. Once you install the app this content is cached to your device, so you don't have to worry about your service provider charging you any roaming fees. This is version 1.0 of the app, so go easy on me with the reviews. Updates will be planned as soon as ferry operators publish the changes on their websites. A cosmetic update of the app's look is also being considered. If you have any comments/bug reports/suggestions, please email me. Enjoy!

description: Made to Make Your Cycle Ride Easy Perhaps you are looking for a leisurely ride and would like to know exactly where you will end up, or maybe you need to know the quickest route to get you to your destination. We are there for you! Cycle Maps displays all of the bicycle routes in a selected area. We collect information of bike maps, bike lanes, and bike trails to get you where you are going, quickly and efficiently. It is an extremely comprehensive app that allows you to search bike routes in your area, or where you are going to be visiting so that you are prepared. Not only that, but Cycle Maps also provides a valuable GPS tracking and compass orientation that will keep you from getting lost. Speed down the bike trail without worrying about getting lost, because you know that we have you covered. Cycle Maps is a part of the Open Cycle Map, which is an open source project that allows for regular updates. You can Ride you Bike and the App will record and save the GPS data. You can now record your Tracks and download them as GPX or KML. Check out the Share option, it will lead you to our website with full track details. Cycle now records your Tracks and share them with the community. Creating Cycle Tracks database, together.
release_text: New Spanish and Korean versions

description: Vytáčejí Vás telemarketingové agentury? Už jste někdy naletěli dotěrným prodejcům po telefonu? Snad každý majitel mobilního telefonu to zná. Zazvoní telefon a na druhém konci se ozve hlas pracovníka marketingové agentury se „skvělou nabídkou“ bankovních služeb, zaručeně levnějších energií, či jiných nepotřebných věcí. Případně s dotazem, zda máte pár minut na průzkum trhu, který však nakonec po dlouhých minutách hovoru vyústí stejně v hon na Vaši peněženku. Někdo chce být slušný a pracovníka na druhém konci alespoň vyslechne, někdo okamžitě pokládá. Asi se shodneme na tom, že podobné nevyžádané hovory většinou obtěžují, vyrušují a kradou Vám volný čas. Aplikace Nevolejte.cz nabízí řešení, jak daným nevyžádaným hovorům zabránit. Jednoduše řečeno, aplikace Nevolejte.cz je call blocker s komunitně budovanou databází čísel prodejců po telefonu, které uživatelé aplikace navzájem sdílí. Pokud je prodejce identifikován alespoň dvěma důvěryhodnými uživateli aplikace, je jeho číslo zablokováno u všech ostatních uživatelů a už se jim nedovolá. Kromě sdílené černé listiny čísel aplikace umí blokovat i individuální hovory od otravných lidí, s kterými si nepřejete hovořit. Aplikace byla záměrně navržena pouze s omezeným počtem nutných funkcí z důvodu, aby ji bylo jednoduché ovládat, a také aby nezpomalovala přítomností zbytečných funkcí rychlost běhu mobilního telefonu a nevybíjela zbytečně baterii. Klíčové vlastnosti aplikace jsou: - Blokování telefonních čísel ručně zadaných uživatelem - Blokování telefonních čísel převzatých z historie volání - Blokování telefonních čísel převzatých z kontaktů uložených v telefonu nebo na SIM kartě - Blokování hovorů na základně komunitně budované černé listiny telefonních čísel - Volitelně blokování hovoru ze skrytých telefonních čísel - Aplikace zobrazuje plnou historii blokovaných hovorů, tak aby uživatel měl přehled kdy a proč byl hovor odmítnut. - Aplikace informuje o zablokovaném hovoru uživatele systémovou notifikací, bez nutnosti sebe sama spouštět. - Aplikace umožňuje lokálně odblokovat telefonní číslo, které blokuje černá listina čísel. (pomocí podržení prstu na záznamu v historii blokovaných hovorů) - Automatický zápis do Registru Nevolejte.cz, kterým majitel telefonu zveřejňuje nesouhlas s marketingovými kontakty po telefonu. - Aplikace umožňuje plnou funkčnost bez internetového připojení. Internetové připojení je nutné pouze během ruční aktualizace černé listiny čísel. - Aplikace upozorňuje uživatele, pokud je lokální kopie černé listiny čísel zastaralá a je nutná její aktualizace. - Plná podpora dual SIM telefonů Prémiové funkce, které je možné získat dočasně zdarma ( více na www.nevolejte.cz/bonus ), jsou: - Automatická aktualizace černé listiny na pozadí bez nutnosti spouštět aplikaci - Prioritní verze černé listiny (běžní uživatelé dostávají aktuální podobu o den později) - Blokování všech telefonních čísel, které nemám uložené v kontaktech (vhodné pro dětské majitele mobilních telefonů) - Blokování příchozích SMS na základě černé listiny (na verzi androidu KitKat a vyšší aplikace pouze upozorňuje na přítomnost na černé listině, ale neblokuje, protože tato verze androidu blokaci neumožňuje ) - Možnost volitelně zapnout si blokování hovorů pouze mimopracovní hodiny (noci a víkendy) Spojme se společně v boji proti nevyžádaným telefonním hovorům! Pomozte budovat černou listinu prodejců po telefonu a zablokujme prodejce na svých mobilních telefonech jednou provždy. Pokud narazíte v aplikaci na nějaký problém případně Vám chybí nějaká užitečná funkce, neváhejte nás kontaktovat na mailu info@nevolejte.cz . Děkujeme. Craze you telemarketing agency? Have you ever been duped intrusive dealers over the phone? Perhaps every mobile phone owner knows it. The phone rings and on the other end will hear the voice of employee marketing agency with "great deals" banking services, guaranteed to cheaper energy, or other unnecessary things. Alternatively, asking if you have a few minutes to survey the market, which finally, after long minutes of conversation will result in the same hunt on your wallet. Someone wants to be a good worker on the other end at least hear someone immediately considered. Perhaps we can agree that such unsolicited calls usually annoy, disturb you and steal leisure. Application Nevolejte.cz offers a solution to a given prevent unsolicited calls. Simply put, the application is Nevolejte.cz call blocker with community-building a database of phone numbers of dealers that users share applications with each other. If the seller is identified by at least two trustees applications, the number is blocked for all other users and you will not let them. In addition to a shared blacklist application numbers can also block individual calls from annoying people with whom you do not talk. Application has been deliberately designed with a limited number of functions necessary for the reason that it was easy to control, and also to the presence of unnecessary features does not slow down the running speed of the mobile phone and the vehicle's battery unnecessarily. Key features of the application are: - Prevent phone numbers manually entered by the user - Blocking numbers taken from the call history - Blocking numbers taken from the contacts stored on your phone or SIM card - Prevent calls to essential community built blacklist phone numbers - Optional blocking calls from hidden numbers - The application displays the full history of blocked calls, so that the user have an overview of when and why the call was rejected. - The application informs the user about the blocked call system notifications without having to run itself. - The application allows locally unblock a phone number that is blocking blacklist numbers. (By holding down your finger on the record in the history of blocked calls) - Automatic enrollment in the Register Nevolejte.cz which phone owner publishes disagreement with marketing contacts over the phone. - The application allows full functionality without an Internet connection. Internet connection is only necessary during manual update blacklist numbers. - The application notifies the user if the local copy of the blacklist numbers outdated and it needs to be updated. - Full support for dual SIM phones Premium features, which can be obtained free of charge temporarily (more on www.nevolejte.cz/bonus) are: - Update the blacklist in the background without having to run the application - Priority version blacklist (ordinary users receive current appearance a day later) - Blocking of phone numbers that I have stored in your contacts (suitable for children of mobile phone owners) - Block incoming SMS based on blacklists (for Android version KitKat and higher application only draws attention to the presence on the blacklist, but not block, because this version of Android does not allow blocking) - Ability to optionally turn on a barring only non-work hours (nights and weekends) Let us join together in the fight against unsolicited phone calls! Help build a blacklist of vendors on the phone and lock vendor on their mobile phones once and for all. If you come in on a problem or we are missing some useful features, do not hesitate to contact us on e-mail info@nevolejte.cz . Thank you.
release_text: Změny v běžné verzi - Při vypnuté blokaci pomocí černé listiny aplikace aspoň varuje, že volající je na černé listině. - Opravena chyba v detekci přítomnosti Facebooku v mobilu. - Vylepšen komfort vkládání nových čísel. Změny v PREMIUM verzi - nová funkce blokující všechny hovory z čísel, které nejsou uložené v kontaktech (vhodné pro dětské uživatele telefonů) - nově blokujeme také SMS zprávy - umíme zapnout blokování hovorů pouze mimo pracovní dobu (noci, víkendy)

description: *** NEW *** Use the Google Leaderboards to compare your performances with those of other players. BrainCise - Mental Arithmetic offers you the possibility to train mental arithmetic specifically and completely free of ads. In the current version the following training modes are available: + Sixty Seconds Solve as much problems of one type as possible within 60 seconds. As problem types there are addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, square a number and root extraction in up to seven difficulty levels selectable. Additionally, a personal ranking offers you an overview over your best results and keeps you motivated to improve yourself steadily. + Survive Receive time credits by solving problems to extend the duration of a game from 20 seconds to a maximum. Each wrong answer is imposed with a time penalty. The complexity of the problems increases with the duration of the game. There are three difficulty levels selectable which have an impact on the height of the given time credits. + Free Practise: Train addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, basic arithmetic operations, square a number, root extraction and decimal calculations as you want to and in up to seven difficulty levels. Because of diverse mathematical problem type and difficulty selection, BrainCise - Mental Arithmetic is suitable for every age group as well as skill level. Languages: English, German [calculate, maths, mathematics, mental arithmetic, mental math]
release_text: Version 2.3.0: + Integration of Google Leaderboards Version 2.2.0: + Animated countdown and bonus (Survive) + Display of personal best (Sixty Seconds, Survive) + Optimised time cheat check Version 2.1.2: + Fixed problem with hidden OK button on keypad + Extended OK button on keypad Version 2.1.1: + Fixed incorrect height of keypad

Mit der Genre-Filterfunktion können Sie sich entscheiden, ob Sie nur Serien, Filme oder Dokumentationen sehen wollen oder doch lieber das Kinderprogramm. Durch unsere TV-Specials können sie auf ein vorsortiertes TV_Programm zugreifen, das Ihnen (aktuelle) Themen wie Krimi, Ski WM, Champions League oder Top-Filme etc. liefert. Wechseln Sie zwischen hellem oder dunklem Design, ganz nach Ihren Vorlieben. Wenn Sie die Werbung stört, können Sie nun auch die kostenpflichtige werbefreie Version erstehen. Natürlich können Sie sich mit der Erinnerungsfunktion auch zu jeder gewünschten Sendung einen Alarm stellen, damit Sie nichts versäumen. Bei uns finden Sie alle österreichischen Sender von ORF über ATV, Servus und Puls4, alle deutschen TV-Sender wie ARD, ZDF, Pro7, RTL, Kabel1 und Co. Fehler, Beschwerden, ... bitte an android@tele.at schicken! Was neu ist: - Gewinnspiele auch in den Apps - Bessere Genre und Sender Filter - Newssystem - kleinere Bugs ausgebessert - Performance-Optimierung tele.at - The Austrian television provides you free the TV guide for more than 120 TV channels in your pocket. You will see clearly with one click what it now in TV plays or naturally runs at 20.15 on TV - now new in landscape mode for Phone, phablet and Tablet! By genre filter function lets you decide whether you want to see only series, films or documentaries or rather the children's program. Through our television specials they can access a pre-sorted TV_Programm which provides you with (current) topics such as Thriller, Ski World Cup, Champions League or top films etc.. Switch between light or dark style, according to your preferences. If the ads annoy you, you can now buy the paid ad-free version. The tele-editorial provides you every day the best handpicked Tips from the TV guide. Of course you can make with the alarm clock and at any desired program an alarm so you do not miss anything. In the background we have heavily optimized by tele, so that you have the fastest and most stable Program Overview Austria in his pocket. Here you will find all the Austrian station ORF about ATV, Servus and Puls4, all German TV stations such as ARD, ZDF, Pro7, RTL, Kabel 1 and Co. but we also have the full Sky program in the TV listing, children program, sports channels, and the radio program. description: You can access the timetable information system of the VRS transportation companies using this app, including current data (on time, delayed) - if available. We set a high value on an user interface that is easy to use in order to provide a companion for everyday life. Some highlights of this app: • Uses your current location • Routing from address to address • Show way on foot using Google Maps • Interactive linemap • Favorite connections, addresses and stops • Buy tickets SEARCH: Display your route - whereever you are - without knowing which is the next stop. The app shows you the correct destination stop and also provides the way on foot using Google Maps. NOW: If you need a overview of stops around you, "Now" is the right choice. You can see the stops around you and the next departures from there. Once again on a map. INTERACTIVE LINEMAP: This is a real highlight. It shows the complete line network of the region clearly arranged and can be operated interactively. You can choose a stop and display its stop timetable, show it on a map, add it to your favorites or define it as origin or destination of a search. FAVORITES: Besides your own "Take me home" connection you can store other connections on your mobile. The app allows you to store connection favorites, addresses and stops using personalized names. TICKETS: Only one registration on https://www.handyticket.de/portals/web/nutzer/kvb/login.html and you can buy tickets in the App THE VRS NETWORK AREA: The VRS is a confederation of the cities Cologne, Bonn, Leverkusen and Monheim as well as the rural districts Rhein-Erft-Kreis, Rhein-Sieg-Kreis, Rheinisch-Bergischer Kreis, Oberbergischer Kreis and Kreis Euskirchen.

description: You can now play the next evolution of the classical match-3 games! This is an incredibly original puzzle game for Android and iOS / iPhone! You will feel amazed after playing this revolutionary match-3 Bejeweled like game!! The universe, in its primordial state, needs your help to spread elements in all worlds to bring life to everything. Have fun blasting elements, make elemental chains to maximize the effect, and use shadow and light elemental powers to your advantage to move up the levels to the endless galaxy! Feel the universe in this unique, addictive and exciting puzzle game! "This is definitely an addicting game and makes for a great casual time killer." Droid Gamers ★ Features ★ - Highly addictive gameplay. - Wonderful cartoon graphics. - Several elementals (fire, water, lighting, earth, wind, shadow, light) - 50+ very fun levels. - Endless mode. - Global Online Ranking (ScoreNinja) - NO ADS !!!!! Compatibility: Android 1.6 and later This game should be compatible and fully playable on every android powered devices, including the HTC Tattoo and other entry-level smartphones. Obviously, the game will run smoother on more powerful devices like the Motorola Droid/Milestone, Google Nexus One, HTC Desire, SonyEricsson Xperia X10, Samsung Galaxy S and so on.

description: This program is designed for those who want to learn interesting mathematical tricks to speed up the calculating. These tricks will help solve part of the mathematical problems and tasks much faster than classical. Will also be helpful to those who want to hone basics such as the multiplication table. When you learn these mathematical tricks, you'll be able to show off your skills to friends and prove to them that you have a talent for mathematics. New skills you can use in the store, at school, at college, at work - wherever thanks to quick calculation skills can save a lot of precious time. Fun Math Tricks: 1. Addition 2. Subtraction 3. Multiplication table 4. Division 5. Multiply two digit number by 11 6. Square numbers ending in 5 7. Multiply by 5 8. Multiply by 9 9. Multiply by 4 10. Dividing by 5 11. Subtracting from 1000 12. Tough multiplication 13. Power of two 14. Adding numbers close to hundreds 15. Subtracting numbers close to hundreds 16. Multiply numbers between 11 and 19 17. Square numbers between 11 and 99 18. Multiply two digit numbers having same tens digit and ones digits add up to ten 19. Square numbers between 50 and 59 20. Square numbers between 40 and 49 21. Multiply two digit numbers editing in 1 22. Percent 23. Square numbers between 100 and 109 ... 84. n^9 Training mode: - 15 levels for every trick - timer 15 seconds Rating stars: - score > 000 - ★☆☆ - score > 350 - ★★☆ - score > 650 - ★★★ This free version of Math Tricks contains third party advertisements. The app uses the following APIs and libraries: * MPAndroidChart - created by Philipp Jahoda * ColorPIcker - created by Piotr Adamus

description: Flipboard is your personal magazine. Used by millions of people everyday, it’s a single place to keep up on the news, follow topics you care about and share stories, videos and photos that influence you. To start, follow a few topics, and Flipboard creates your personal magazine. You can always add more as you find new topics, magazines or interesting people to follow. Read world class publications like The New York Times, PEOPLE magazine, Fast Company, and Vanity Fair on Flipboard -- find any source with the search bar. You can also connect Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and LinkedIn to Flipboard and easily flip through pictures and posts from friends. Save stories you enjoy or express a point of view. Use the + button on anything you find to collect it into your own magazine. You can see all your magazines in your Flipboard Profile. For more on how to make your own magazine, visit www.flipboard.com. Download Flipboard and get started today—it’s free! Plus more great features: • Collect stories you love into your own magazine. Tap the “+” button on any story, select ‘create a magazine’ and collect favorite stories, images or videos. • Manage all your magazines in a convenient dashboard at https://editor.flipboard.com/ • Read The Daily Edition to quickly check the news you need for your day, with stories hand-picked by our editorial staff. • Go to your Flipboard to check what’s happening now. Use the home button on the phone (or Cover Stories on tablets) to see highlights across everything you’re following. • Enjoy Flipboard in 24 localized editions—for Australia, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, India, Italy, Japan, Korea, Latin America, Malaysia, Netherlands, Philippines, Russia, Singapore, South Africa, Spain, Taiwan, Turkey, U.S., U.K., U.S. Latino. • On tablets, explore hundreds of staff picks in the Content Guide (tap the red ribbon at the top), including must-read magazines and blogs, gorgeous photography and special curated sections devoted to the news of the day and other interests. • Use the Flipboard widget for quick access on your Android device. • Add content from the web to your Flipboard magazines through the bookmarklet at share.flipboard.com. KEEP UP ON FLIPBOARD: For tips and other helpful information visit our website http://www.flipboard.com and follow us via @flipboard on Twitter, on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/flipboard and Google+ at https://plus.google.com/+Flipboard . To learn more about how to use Flipboard, visit our Support Page. http://flipboard.com/support If you are having technical issues or have any questions, contact us at http://flip.it/support .
release_text: - Flipboard now opens faster with improved app launch speed Feedback is always welcome. Please message us inside the app under Settings, Help & Feedback, or email support@flipboard.com with any issues or suggestions. Thank you for using Flipboard.

description: This is the one and only official app for the popular fmylife.com website, which publishes the finest slices of day-to-day embarrassments and misfortunes. Get your daily fix of freshly updated stories, laughs, cringes and even create your own free member's account to take advantage of added features. YOU LIKE FML? Become a fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/fml Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/fml If you have any technical issues: support@fmylife.com This official application was developed by William Paumier, with the FML team. • Read, vote and comment on the FMLs • Submit your own stories • Share the stories on Facebook, Twitter, SMS or e-mail • Sort the FMLs by Top, Flop or by category • Read randomly selected FMLs • Add FMLs to your favorites to read them again later or to share them with your friends • Each week, discover a brand new illustrated FML created by a different artist • Search through the FMLs using keywords • Fill out your member’s profile • Moderate the FMLs to help the website’s team to publish the funniest stories • Read the FML team’s blog to keep yourself informed about what’s going on + Loads more stuff to come in future updates!
release_text: After a year in the pipeline, here’s the all-new FML! Your feedback is priceless, so don’t hesitate to use the Contact section in the menu in case of bugs or if you have any remarks.

description: The Wifi Radar is an application which can display the physical location of wireless networks. The application uses your device's digital compass for determining the location of each network. See the wireless networks around you, recover your default passwords for your wifi network, analyze signals or find the best channel for your Access Point. Features: - 360° Radar Scan with compass visualization. - Recover default passwords for your wifi network with keygen (a lot of common routers are supported). - Signal strength graph analyzer. - Channel analyzer. *** Additional Info: All used keygen algorithms are from public domain/open source code. The permission WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and READ_PHONE_STATE is used by the ad library for caching ads on the device for better performance and for reading the unique device identifier of the device for statistical purposes.
release_text: ver. 3.03 Marshmallow support and compass fix ver. 3.01-2 Minor bug fixes (occurring on specific devices) Connect to best open spot fix ver. 3.00 Material Design Keygen added to recover you default passwords New advanced compass mechanism Remove ads by watching short video clip Many bug fixes The application is currently in beta stage, please feel free to send suggestions, report bugs and errors.

description: Come explore with NASA and discover the latest images, videos, mission information, news, feature stories, tweets, NASA TV and featured content with the NASA App for Android. Features: - Over 14,000 images (and growing everyday) - Latest news and features stories - Latest on demand NASA videos from around the agency - Current NASA mission Information - Live streaming of NASA TV - Live streaming video from the High Definition Earth Viewing (HDEV) experiment on the ISS - Launch information & countdown clocks - Current visible passes for the International Space Station (ISS) and notifications - Current visible passes for other missions (Fermi, Hinode, Hubble...) - ISS and Earth orbiting satellite trackers - NASA Twitter Feeds from around the agency - Facebook® Connect and integrated Twitter™ client for easy sharing - Schedule for NASA TV and NASA-Related Programming on Other TV Channels - Map, information and links to all of the NASA visitor centers - Featured content and program sections - Earth as Art image collection and interactive map - Third Rock Radio (alternative rock radio station) - Favorites & image bookmarks - 5 star rating system for images and videos with top rated list
release_text: - Fix for Third Rock Radio - Minor bug fixes & stability improvements If you're experiencing any problems and need technical support for the NASA App: Please email us at: arc-dl-mobile@mail.nasa.gov

description: DOWNLOAD WITH US, CANADIAN GREAT LAKES & GULF OF MEXICO NAUTICAL CHARTS OVERLAYS!!! You have been searching for affordable and meaningful app product to enhance your saltwater fishing activities and we have good news. Fishing Ops Pro uses the latest technologies to empower you with information and insight from every experience so you can maximize your results. We deliver the best in class saltwater fishing application and website for our valued friends (AKA customers). We designed Fishing Ops Pro to be easy and effective regardless of your activity or experience level. When we share what we love and by aligning our passion for our product with your passion for quality, our community will grow as big as the Great Outdoors! Your data is kept totally secure with a unique system, which is only accessible by you! Here is what you get in our product: 1. EXCELLENT MAPS- Navigate marine environments with confidence in different terrains and bodies of water. 2. GPS NAVIGATION AND ONE-TOUCH WAYPOINTS - Easily maintain current position, view the relationship to other points of interest, and quickly mark waypoints of fishing interest and navigational interest. 3. CATCH/CATCH & RELEASE/RECON NOTES- Save your pictures and easily record your tackle and tactic details and easily compare the next time you go. Fish with confidence! 4. FISHING CAMERA- Capture all the action without leaving the app and every picture can auto collect all of the environmental details automatically! 5. AUTO-JOURNAL- No more hand written journals that steal your time. The first ever journal that auto stores every fishing activity and auto collects all the environmental details. 6. AUTO TRIP SHARING- Never wait again for pictures, everyone auto shares all the memories from your angling exploits automatically! 7. FISHING WEATHER- Get the forecast, marine forecast, tides, barometer and the lunar phase. 8. EAST TRIP SETUP- Set up your trip and invite your buddies for a seamless experience that collects all the pictures, all the waypoints and all the fun! 9. FISH-ON STEALTH NOTIFICATIONS- When you are fishing with friends but in different locations and you don't want to let the whole world know over the radio or don't have time to text or call, we offer a one-and-done push button that sends your friends your activity and gives them your GPS location for getting in on the action! 10. US STATE BY STATE FISHING REGS- Is it legal? Never worry when the game warden checks your cooler. 11. ON-BOARD SUPPORT- We offer you the answers to your questions with amazing support that answers all requests within one hour. Read the poor support of other apps. We love our products and our friends (AKA Customers) and we are always ready to help! 12. METRIC AND IMPERIAL SETTINGS- Easily switch all measurement to what you are accustomed to very easily. 13. IN-APP SOCIAL MEDIA SHARING- Connect with buddies, share info and pictures easily and seamlessly!

description: KillSud - Killer Sudoku is a variation of Sudoku, as described at Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Killer_sudoku In addition to the rules of regular Sudoku, there are two more rules in KillSud: 1) The sum of all numbers in a cage must match the small number printed in its corner. 2) No number appears more than once in a cage. Play the exciting game of KillSud and test your skills. * KillSud contains over 4,000 puzzles ranging from fairly easy to really complicated in 6 levels of difficulty. * A special sum calculator to help in choosing the numbers. * Detailed help is available under "menu". * AutoSave / AutoRestore of ongoing puzzle. * Undo moves (no redo) - See Help for details. If you encounter any bug in KillSud please e-mail the developer with details. Don't report it in reviews NOTE1: Click the white area of the running timer to toggle showing elapsed time on/off. NOTE2: The little purple box below the [new] button is an addition helper. Click on it and the sum of the "marked cage" is added. To prevent adding the same cage twice, each cage can be added to the addition helper ONLY ONCE (until the helper is cleared) Long-click the helper to clear it.
release_text: version 6.4: Menu button on bottom-left. This will bring a "menu" screen. Exit this screen ONLY with "Return" button. version 6.3: If menu button is not available (neither by long-click task switcher, nor by 3 dots) then click the 3 white bars at the bottom-left of the main screen (where you choose the level of play) This should solve the "missing" menu button for newer android versions.

description: Track World’s all leading US, European and Asian Stock Market Indices. All major Global market indexes including Dow Jones, Nasdaq, CAC, DAX, Nikkei, Hang Seng and many more are displayed in tabular format. * All US, European and Asian Markets are displayed as list in separate tabs * Feature to view the full details of individual market index with charts on click of stock name row * Full size charts * Related News Stories * Ability to add/remove indices of your choice. * Optimized for tablets **Pro version is now available.** If you like this application, consider upgrading to "Global Stock Markets Pro" to support the development of the app. Pro version is faster, cleaner and Ad free. Pro version has seven chart options.

description: MightyMeeting is the best way to share presentations, videos, interactive applications, and drawings in the classroom, meeting room, and online. PowerPoint presentations and PDF documents can be stored in your private and secure online content repository, downloaded to your Android tablet, and opened anywhere, even when your device is not connected to the Internet. You can quickly switch between presentations or jump to any slide in a presentation. You can annotate slides with drawings. You can also create an interactive whiteboard and use it to draw diagrams or write mathematical equations. Content, applications, and drawings can be shared in online meetings. A meeting attendee can join via tablet, phone, or any other device with a web browser. At the end of a meeting, you can email slides, annotations, and drawings as a PDF document. Here are just a few ways to use MightyMeeting: -Open a sales presentation and share it with a prospect locally or remotely -Take turns presenting slides and drawings in a team meeting -Brainstorm on product design ideas by drawing on a shared whiteboard -Control slides remotely and share the whiteboard in a boardroom meeting -Share mathematical formulas and diagrams with fellow researchers -Teach a class remotely and share slides and drawings with your students Use MightyMeeting today to engage your audience and transform a one-way presentation into a collaborative experience. Make Every Meeting a Mighty Meeting.
release_text: Provided the multiple choice questions plugin

description: Watch as shining, ever changing star patterns and cloud formations unfold. There is an eye hidden in the galaxies. Once you see the eye, you can’t unsee the eye... You will soon drift away into outer space. Watch the morphing star patterns, while relaxing or meditating. You can enjoy this free version for as long as you want, but the full version has much more features! You can choose the color, size and brightness of the stars. You can also choose the backgrounds, the speed and much more. Battery saving functionality is included in the full version and it has no commercials.
